publication.abstract: New functions are proposed for itkMinimumMaximumImageCalculator. One function allows for excluding pixels of a specified value from the computations. Another function stores all pixel indices of the maximum/minimum value. This paper is accompanied with source code for the filter and test, test images and parameters, and expected output images.
